price: Nenda, wewe na ndugu yako, pamoja na ishara zangu, wala msichoke kunikumbuka.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
